scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:web
scripts.build:wasm: cargo build --release -p shard-den-wasm && wasm-pack build packages/wasm --target web --out-dir pkg
scripts.test: npm run test:rust && npm run test:web
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:rust && npm run test:coverage:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:rust && npm run lint:web
scripts.fmt: cargo fmt --all && cd packages/web && npm run fmt
scripts.clean: cargo clean && rm -rf packages/web/.next packages/web/node_modules packages/wasm/pkg
